name: Neon City Panic
description:
This project was made as part of a class project at the University of Central Florida in Casual Game Production during the Spring of 2018.  The build available here is a PC targeted build but there are arcade, and Limbitless flex sensor integrated builds in existence.

Credits

Sarah Case : Executive Producer

Daniel Dvorak : Creative Director

Waldo Rodriguez : Producer, Tech Lead

Tyler Chighizola : Art Director, Environment Design

Derek Bailey : Ship Artist

Christian Ocampo : Ship Artist

Taylor Crook : Character Artist, Background Artist

Matthew Stone : Boss Models, Ship Concepts

Beba Vazquez: UI Artist

Jeremy Dandeneau: Effects Artist, Power-ups, Trucker Concept

Khoa Anh Nguyen: Programmer

Noah Sands: Sound Design
